channel.title: Di Cook Award
channel.description: Di Cook Award aims to encourage statistical software development by providing formal recognition of these developments showcase the pool of statistical software developers in our local communities and raise awareness of the statistical tools developed by community members.

item.title: A web app to interactively explore the electricity usage
item.dc:creator: Jane Smith
item.description: In this tutorial, I show how to use my web app to explore user-submitted electricity usage data.

item.title: An R-package to study the Pokemon GO data
item.dc:creator: Ash Ketchum
Misty
Brock
Professor Samuel Oak
item.description: Pok√©mon Go is a 2016 augmented reality mobile game. We collected some citizen reported data to find out where it is best to catch rare Pokemons.
